title: Sample Bottles
author: ayobami
description: Test your knowledge of sample bottles in this quiz

questions.question: Sodium Oxalate is majorly used as the additive for coagulation tests
Plain bottles can be used to measure glucose levels
Fluoride can inhibit hexokinase so it is used as the additive for plasma glucose test
Fluoride can inhibit enolase so it is used as the additive for plasma glucose test
In venipuncture, the torniquet should be tied for less than 2 minuites
The plain bottle is the recommended sample bottle for measuring lipid profile
While using the EDTA sample bottle, the blood should ideally be made to fill the bottle
For complete blood count, the EDTA sample bottle is the best choice because it preserves the cells for counting
Fasting blood glucose test cannot be done in a plain bottle because the red cells use up the glucose
Fluoride oxalate is the correct choice for a plasma glucose test
